treatment.reference: Complete Genome Sequence of a Thermophilic Methanogen, Methanocella conradii HZ254, Isolated from Chinese Rice Field Soil J Bact 194:2398-2399
treatment.description: Strain HZ254 shows an optimum growth temperature of 50 to 55Â°C and a specific growth rate of up to 0.11 per hour. It uses H2/CO2 but not formate, acetate, methanol, methylamines, or alcohols for CH4 production. Acetate is required as a carbon source for growth.
